title: High sulfur content composite materials from renewable fatty acid cellulose esters (FACE) via inverse vulcanization
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00424H, Paper
Open Access

Timo Sehn, Julian Fanelli, Lisa Wahl, Michael A. R. Meier
Herein, we introduce an efficient inverse vulcanization of fully renewable cellulose-based monomers. Therefore, biobased fatty acid cellulose esters (FACEs) with different degrees of substitution (0.38 ≤ DS ≤ 0.62) were...
